channel.title: Black Screen
channel.description: Been posting for days. No one has helped. Me or one of my friends log in to my server and it takes 15-20 seconds of being at black screen then it logs you in, then the enitre server laggs extremely bad for 10 seconds. ANYONE>!?

item.description:

there is most likely the fault of a stupid hoster someone who doesnt know how to code, someone who shouldnt host a server, etc. or just get a new client theres plenty out there -.- yours isnt uniqueâ€¦
